result.html: ní thuigimI don't understand.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: I didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.

result.eng: No imagination at all is needed to understand this.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
